title: Lumen
description: Estranged on an island are people of great power. Through prayer, their abilities grow; manifesting energy and matter. They call to the Luminary, Gods in their own right.Evolve or Die?Daniel goes through his final transition, and with that, greater power, greater control. After a near-death experience, Daniel's admitted into the island's only private school. It becomes a privilege he's not allowed to forget.While trying to fit in, Daniel wakes mysteries and troubles beyond the life he came from. They threaten everything he once believed in.
author: Joseph Hunt
